rukus.text: hananimgwa seonjija ap-eseo eotteoh ge bulsinjadeul-eul wihan joyag-eul chegyeol hal su issneunyo geuleona halamsawon-eseochegyeolhan joyag-eun je-oelo geudeul-i neo huiege jinsilhal ttae neohuido geudeul-egejinsilhaeya doenani sillo hananim-eun jeong-uiloun ideul-eul salanghasinila

eotteohge geuleohan joyag-i iss-eul su issneunyo geudeul-i neohuiboda ilo un wichie iss-eul ttae geudeul-on neohuiwa ui joyag-eul jonjungchi anihamyeo geudeul eun geudeul-ui ib-euloman neohuileul gippeu ge haneun deus hana geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun geojeolhago issdoda sillo geudeul daeda suneun saagham-ila
geudeul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eulo ha chanh-eun geos-eul eod-eo hananim-ui gil-e deul eoseoneun salamdeul-eul mag-ass-euni geudeul-i haenghaessdeon modeun ildeul-e bulhaeng-i iss-eu lila
geudeul-eun sin-ang-indeul-eul jongyeongchi anihago joyagdo junsuchi anihani ideul-eun beomjuleul neom-eoseon ideul-ila

geuleona geudeul-i hoegaehago ye baeleul deulimyeo iseullamseleul bachilttae geudeul-eun god mid-eum-ui neohui hyeongjedeul-i la geulihayeo hananim-eun iseong-i iss neun baegseongdeul-eul wihae malsseum-ui yejeung-eul seolmyeongham-ila
joyag ihu geudeul-i joyag-eul wibanham-on geudeul-i neohuiui jong-gyoleul gong gyeogham-ini bulsinjadeul-ui udumeolideul e tujaenghala geudeul-eun mid-eum-i eobs-eu ni jeojidoel geos-ila

joyag-eul wibanhago seonjijaleul chubanghalyeo eummohayeoss-eumyeo neohuileul gong-gyeoghan muliege tujaenghaji anhneunyo hananimkke gwonneung-i iss-eusini neohuiga midneun jadeul-ilamyeon hananim-eul dulyeowo hala

geudeul-e tujaenghala hananim-eun neohuiui son-eulo geudeul-eul beolhasa geu deul-eul suchiseuleobge hayeo neohuiege seunglileul angyeoda jusimyeo mid-eum-i iss neun beogseong-ui ma-eum-eul chilyohayeo jusi nila
geudeul ma-eumsog-ui bunnoleul jiwo jusimyeo tteus-i issneunja-ege yongseoleul bepusini hananim-eun almgwa jihyelo chungmanhasinila

neohuijung-e seongjeonhaneunjaga nugu-imyeo hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijawa midneun jadeul-eul ttaleuneun jaga nugu-in galeul hananimkkeseo alji moshanchae oe myeondanghalila saeng-gaghaessneunyo hananim eun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
